Widget.name: Chart Switcher
Widget.Description: This widget can contain many Chart widgets configured for different categories, and the user can select which one to display. (Only supports 360 official charting widgets).

Option.name: Widget Title
Option.Description: Widget title. If blank, no name is displayed.

Option.name: Width
Option.Description: Specifies the width of the widget (pixels). You must enter an integer.

Option.name: Height
Option.Description: Specifies the height of the widget (pixels). You must enter an integer.

Option.name: JSP path to use if no results
Option.Description: If there are no results, the widget is either hidden using a trigger, or a message is displayed using the content of a JSP file.
